group_1.textLeft: Splitting a water-meh-lon…?

group_1.textRight: Yep! It's a fun kind of game.@Have you ever played it, Toyo?

group_1.textLeft: I've never done it before…
What's a water-meh-lon anyway?

group_1.textRight: You've never seen a watermelon?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: That makes sense…@They didn't have watermelons in this era…

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: O-oh, it's nothing…
Well… Watermelon is a food that's super tasty@in the summer…

group_1.textLeft: Huh… So it's a kind of food?

group_1.textRight: Yes. It's round and green on the outside@and red and very sweet on the inside.

group_1.textLeft: You mean like bamboo shoots?

group_1.textRight: Why would…?
…Oh, come to think of it, you haven't gone@hunting for bamboo shoots lately.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's…because it's so hot out.

group_1.textRight: I see…@Well, it has been pretty warm these days…

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad that Rena and you guys can handle it.

group_1.textRight: Ah, of course.
Well, I'm glad they took the job.

group_1.textLeft: …You're happy with it?@Don't you gotta work with Himiko's brother?

group_1.textRight: There ain't much choice...@In this day and age, status is pretty important.
There's not many folks around who can@casually look after a pet.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so…

group_1.textRight: Besides, it looks like he's been vying@for our favor.
I don't think Slurpy will be treated badly.

group_1.textLeft: …That makes sense.

group_1.textRight: Well, anyway. I'll need to drop off Slurpy@in the morning we leave for the trip.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Think Toyo is gonna cry and whine?
I bet we'll HAVE to take Slurpy with us.

group_1.textRight: Hahaha, you said it!

group_1.textLeft: So… What's next?

group_1.textRight: Oh, yeah, we were in the middle of the@"Nemu" discussion, weren't we?
You said you left her at Lady Himiko's@place but…

group_1.textLeft: I mean, yeah, I left it behind...
Do you think Lady Himiko is gonna try@and investigate the book?!

group_1.textRight: No need to worry.
Himiko was simply interested in the@bookbinding techniques.
She's not trying to read Big Sister's records.
…To start with, the queen is completely@illiterate.

group_1.textLeft: Wouldn't it be bad to be able to study@future bookbinding techniques?

group_1.textRight: People of this era don't understand it,@so there's nothing to worry about.
…It would be riskier if you came forward as the@book's owner, and got probed with questions.
Himiko might catch on to something@from the slightest word.

group_1.textLeft: It would also be altering history to give them@knowledge that wasn't available at this time.
So we have to do our best to avoid it.

group_1.textRight: …Looks to me like you've been doing whatever@you want regardless of the consequences...
...And yet surprisingly, nothing has gone wrong,@so just keep staying close to Toyo.

group_1.textLeft: I got it.

group_1.textRight: You were motionless and quiet this time...

group_1.textLeft: This is also one of our culture's customs,@so please respect it.

group_1.textRight: V-very well…

group_1.textLeft: …And that's what she said.

group_1.textRight: Wasn't Lady Himiko taken aback?@That's what I'm really curious about...
Well… In any case, she won't treat us badly,@so I guess we can rest assured?

group_1.textLeft: If push comes to shove, we can just steal@the book from her.

group_1.textRight: That's so reckless…

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, in order to retrieve the concept,@Toyo has to be the successor...which means...
We need to witness the moment when@she becomes the next queen.

group_1.textRight: …We can't change history…
But maybe…we can help improve@their relationship, right?

group_1.textLeft: I'd like Toyo to succeed her with a smile,@after all.

group_1.textRight: ...That's why we have to make this trip@a success!

group_1.textLeft: Himiko seems to be coming too,@for what it's worth.
I'm sure everything will work out!

group_1.textRight: Huh... Is it morning already?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Toyo… You're up early.
Ah, were you way too excited and stayed up@all night?

group_1.textLeft: Nahaha… That's right…

group_1.textRight: For now, let's go drop off Slurpy, okay?
You've not dropped him off yet?

group_1.textLeft: Ah… Lady Himiko.
Hey… Weren't we going to pick you up?

group_1.textRight: ...You were taking your time,@so I came to you instead.
Hurry up and get ready to leave soon…@[chara:834100:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:834100:motion_300][chara:834100:lipSynch_1]*Yawn*

group_1.textLeft: She yawned…
You couldn't sleep from excitement either?@Like mother, like daughter.

group_1.textRight: …I-isn't that a good thing?

group_1.textLeft: Is that true…?@Did Mama look forward to this that much?

group_1.textRight: Th-that's…

group_1.textLeft: I was really…REALLY looking forward to it!
I never thought I'd get to do this with Mama…
And have her take me to somewhere@I've never seen…
I'm not alone anymore…@I've got everyone and…Mama's with me too.

group_1.textRight: …Toyo?

group_1.textLeft: I wanted to go so badly…@I wish I could have gotten at least that!

group_1.textRight: Everything's okay...@Let's go, Toyo!
Mama made arrangements for us to leave@the main shrine for a while.
Let's go to the beach, Toyo.@Haven't you been looking forward to it?

group_1.textLeft: …I can't go.

group_1.textRight: Huh…?

group_1.textLeft: Ma…ma…
